title: Principall points of holy profession touching these three estates of mankind. 1. Their creation. 2. Their subuertion. 3. Their restoration. Wherein 1. Gods mercifulnesse. 2. Satans maliciousnesse. 3. And mans weakenesse is made manifest. Composed in verse by H.A.G.
author: H. A. (Henry Arthington)
publicationStmtPublisher: [By W. Jaggard] for Tho. Pauyer, and are to be sold at his shop, entring into the Exchange,
